entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 a.m. MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
